bbox.description: BBOX of the project  (minX, minY, maxX, maxY) If not specified, we will compute the outer BBOX from GeoJSON layers

color.description: Color of the project. Will be used on the home map to draw the rectangle. If not specified, a random color will be generated.

description.description: A short description of the project in text only. Will be used for the project's card.

id.description: Unique identifier of the project acroos all projects.

image.description: Image of the project that will be used to create the project card. It's a relative path to the image.

sources.description: List of layer that can be used on maps A layer can be a tiles URL or a path to a geojson

id.description: Unique identifier of the map across the project. Will be used in the URL.

layers.description: List of ordered layers IDS for the map
